definition: soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
lit. spirit and soul upside down (idiom); infatuated and head over heels in love/fascinated/captivated
ecstasy/rapture/to feel overwhelming joy or sorrow
ghost of one who died unjustly/departed spirit demanding vengeance for grievances
lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom)/fig. to be frightened stiff/spooked out of one's mind/terror-stricken
to miss/to yearn day and night
to be preoccupied (idiom)/to be inattentive/to be frightened out of one's mind
to return from the grave/(old) to recycle (waste products)

sentences.english: He restores my soul; He guides me on the paths of righteousness ForHis name's sake.
sentences.chinese: 祂使我的魂苏醒，为自己的名引导我走义路。

sentences.english: Who knows whether the human spirit goes upward and the spirit of animals goes downward to the earth?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道人的灵是往上升，兽的魂是下入地呢？

sentences.english: The doctrine of the existence of soul as indipendent of matter.
sentences.chinese: 魂的存在的道与物质互相关的。

sentences.english: What is the soul of a nation?
sentences.chinese: 什么才是中华民族的魂？

sentences.english: Death now my master; cold as stone upon the field; I fall like blossom.
sentences.chinese: 司命今已至，冷若旷野一顽石，魂如落花逝。

sentences.english: Meeting the missing husband with a sweet girl.
May he then come and cleanse our hearts by his Spirit, from all that defiles.
sentences.chinese: 愿他来洁净我们的魂和灵，远离我们的过犯。

sentences.english: Who knoweth the spirit of man that goeth upward, and the spirit of the beast that goeth downward to the earth?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道人的灵是往上升，兽的魂是下入地呢。

sentences.english: If the body returns to the ground, where does the spirit or our soul go?
sentences.chinese: 如果身体归了土，我们的灵或魂将去哪里？

sentences.english: Black cat eyes took my soul.
sentences.chinese: 黑猫用眼睛勾走了我的魂。

sentences.english: Our heart and soul builds the heaven on earth.
sentences.chinese: 我们的心与魂在人间创立了天堂。

sentences.english: This bites conscience Bi, but namely those early annuals the cutthroat hired along regal house bite blood to return conscience use.
sentences.chinese: 这噬魂匕，却是当年皇室所雇的杀手噬血归魂所用。

sentences.english: For what shall a man be profited if he gains the whole world, but forfeits his soul-life?
sentences.chinese: 人若赚得全世界，却赔上自己的魂生命，有什么益处？

sentences.english: Continue to base soil, fragrant soul to it implanted.
sentences.chinese: 继续垒土，植入芳香的魂。

sentences.english: Who knows if the spirit of man rises upward and if the spirit of the animal goes down into the earth?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道人的灵是往上升，兽的魂是下入地呢？

sentences.english: Let's run quick before they come and take our souls!
sentences.chinese: 我们赶快逃吧，免得他们来把我们的魂勾走。

definition: soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
three immortal souls in Daoism, representing spirit and intellect
seven mortal forms in Daoism, representing carnal life and desires/contrasted with 三魂 three immortal souls
three immortal souls and seven mortal forms in Daoism, contrasting the spiritual and carnal side of man
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
